attributes.action: Accordingly address the abuse of basic human rights in Switzerland for those who practice Islam as a faith.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The intention of this petition is about human rights, equality and fairness. It is about addressing the false propaganda that creates insecurity and false beliefs, thus producing a result as witnessed in Switzerland that is a clear abuse on human rights and the freedom to practice a faith.

A minaret is an aged old design of a holy place of worship, no different to a synagogue or church. Will the swiss ban all Catholic churches in-order to Hitler claimed the 'jewing' of Europe the Swiss are claiming the 'islamifying' of europe.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for the action you would like to see taken. We can not accept petitions that call on the PM or Government to "address", "recognise" or "acknowledge" as we do not consider these to be recognisable actions.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
